title: Find the Blood of Lathander
content:
d see what they were guarding. We used the Dawnmaster's Crest to safely retrieve the Blood of Lathander - Morninglord be praised.

We found a note from a Lathander worshipper about a precious relic called "The Blood" hidden somewhere in Rosymorn Monastery. Perhaps we can find more in our exploration.

A fake artefact in Rosymorn Monastery was disguised as the Blood of Lathander - we should keep looking for the true relic.

We moved some ancient Lathanderian statues and a secret passageway opened
